title: Hi, How Are You?: The Life, Art, & Music of Daniel Johnston
description: Hi, How Are You? The Definitive Daniel Johnston Handbook Tarssa English and Ron English Affable cult figure Daniel Johnston breaks out above-ground with a new guidebook to his lyrics, stories, paintings and drawings. Daniel Johnston is a celebrated sensation, an intensely respected musician and artist of the last fifteen years. His music has been covered by notable bands, including Nirvana on their MTV Unplugged CD. Soft Skull proudly unveils the first book on his life and times.
author: Tarssa Yazdani
